summary.span: 所包含的方法的泛型类型参数。

span.span: The generic type arguments of the contained method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有当调用的方法为泛型时，才必须设置这些泛型类型参数。The generic type arguments must only be set if the called method is generic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 活动的 GenericTypeArguments。The following code sample demonstrates setting the GenericTypeArguments of an activity. 此示例来自 [使用 InvokeMethod 活动](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-invokemethod-activity) 示例。This example is from the [Using the InvokeMethod Activity](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-invokemethod-activity) sample. summary.span: 要在执行活动时调用的方法的名称。

span.span: The name of the method to be invoked when the activity executes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用的方法必须声明为公共方法。The invoked method must be declared as public. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 活动的 MethodName 属性。The following code sample demonstrates setting the MethodName property of an activity. 此示例来自 [使用 InvokeMethod 活动](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-invokemethod-activity) 示例。This example is from the [Using the InvokeMethod Activity](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-invokemethod-activity) sample. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parameters As Collection(Of Argument)

summary.span: 要调用的方法的参数集合。

span.span: The parameter collection of the method to be invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将参数添加到集合中的顺序必须与这些参数在方法签名中出现的顺序相同。The parameters must be added to the collection in the same order that they appear in the method signature. 参数不能命名为 `TargetObject` 或 `Result` 。Parameters cannot be named `TargetObject` or `Result`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 活动的 Parameters。The following code sample demonstrates setting the Parameters of an activity. 此示例来自 [使用 InvokeMethod 活动](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-invokemethod-activity) 示例。This example is from the [Using the InvokeMethod Activity](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-invokemethod-activity) sample.
